import React,{useState} from 'react' const CatComponent = (props)=>{ const {current, setCurrent} = useState(0) const handleNext = (e)=>{ setCurrent(current+1) } return(
{props.intro.caption}
{props.intro.category}
{props.posts.cat[current]}
Latest News
{props.posts.latest_news}
Top News
{props.posts.top_news}
) } export default CatComponent
